Package index

Fit MID models

interpret()
Fit a MID Model

Methods

plot(<mid>)
Plot MID Component Functions
ggmid() autoplot(<mid>)
Plot MID Component Functions with ggplot2
mid.plots()
Plot Multiple MID Component Functions
predict(<mid>)
Predict Method for fitted MID Models
mid.effect() mid.f()
Calculate Single Effect of a MID Model
print(<mid>)
Print MID Models
summary(<mid>)
Summarize MID Models
mid.terms()
Extract Terms from a MID Model

Methods

Methods
